title: baristor
author: baristor
content: Does anyone know any good exchange why back in the day there were many European and American places to buy btc with credit card internationally. I can do paypal or gift cards. Does anyone know any reliable exchange which gives crypto for giftcards?

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Noones.comHave bought insanly much btc for razer gold gift cards. when i buy i have like fifty 20$ US gift cards and open one trade each time and never had a problem.
